content.query:
USE DATABASE

SELECT
-- count(*)
    MeterCategory, sum(CostInKroner) as Cost
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/usage/exports/monthly/aggregate/parquet/Extended_ACMMonthlyAmortizedCost_overview_Threeyears.parquet/*/*/*.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
        where Report_Date = '2024-04-01'
        and ResourceGroup = 'Synapse'
        group by MeterCategory
        order by Cost desc
